This creature enters with a +1/+1 counter on it.
Whenever this creature or another creature you control leaves the battlefield, if it had counters on it, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Nonartifact creatures you control with counters on them have retrofit {1}{B}. [i](You may cast them from the battlefield for their retrofit cost. They're 4/4 artifact creatures and lose retrofit.)[/i]
